name: High-Stakes PSN Encounter Tactics
description: Specialized techniques for handling and neutralizing high-risk encounters with psychopaths, sociopaths, and narcissists.

cards.title: Identifying Immediate Threat Levels
cards.description: Quickly assessing the level of danger in an encounter with a PSN.
bulletpoints: Eye movement analysis reveals intent and emotional concealment.
Forced stillness in conversation signals predatory focus.
The absence of emotional contagion suggests low empathy or manipulation.
cards.summaryText: Read micro-cues and empathy gaps fast to size up how dangerous the PSN truly is.

cards.title: Turning PSN Games Against Them
cards.description: Using their own manipulation tactics to disrupt their control.
bulletpoints: Feigning compliance while setting up an escape weakens their position.
Overloading them with unpredictable responses forces cognitive strain.
Mirroring their tactics subtly forces them into an unfamiliar role.
cards.summaryText: Stage pretend obedience, then flip the script with chaos that cracks their control loops.

cards.title: High-Stakes Psychological Warfare
cards.description: Outmaneuvering PSNs in hostile or survival-critical scenarios.
bulletpoints: Provoking controlled paranoia forces them to self-destruct.
Feeding them false intel creates misdirection for strategic advantage.
Forcing them into emotional outbursts exposes their true nature to observers.
cards.summaryText: Seed paranoia and misinformation until they implode or reveal themselves publicly.
